mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room_join_request ( join_id, request_user_email, host_user_email, room_id, status, apply_message, requested_at ) VALUES ( UUID(), #{requestUserEmail}, #{hostUserEmail}, #{roomId}, '신청중', #{applyMessage}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE room_join_request SET status = '신청중', apply_message = #{applyMessage}, requested_at = NOW() WHERE request_user_email = #{requestUserEmail} AND room_id = #{roomId} AND status = '거절'
mapper.select: SELECT rjr.join_id AS joinId, r.title AS studyTitle, u.nickname AS nickname, rjr.status FROM room_join_request rjr JOIN rooms r ON rjr.room_id = r.room_id JOIN users u ON rjr.host_user_email = u.email WHERE rjr.request_user_email = #{requestUserEmail} ORDER BY rjr.requested_at DESC
